Name: Spartakian League
Description: A free slave movement considered by the Canopians and the Marians to be illegal and a dangerous threat, the Spartakian League advocates for rebellion and wealth redistribution through violent and military means. Their ideology, based on the historical slave revolt that shook Rome, is banned in the Hegemony but is published uncensored in the Magistracy.
ReputationStatements: You wanna get paid, don't you? Take this job, and we all end up with more money. You've nothing to lose.

MissionSuccessStatements: That went well. Real well. Seems like we did the right thing in calling you in, mercenary. Glad to see we both came out ahead today.
GoodFaithFailureStatements: You didn't get the job done like we wanted, but you tried. And I like that kind of guts, even if I'm not entirely happy with the result.
BadFaithFailureStatements: For someone with your hardware, I expected better things. You let us down, Commander—and I'm gonna be sure to tell everyone I know not to count on you in the future.
